title: Rockk Club currently accepting players from all tiers and all playstyles.
body:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/222016786185453568/222392134542688258/unknown.png
Rockk will be a club where a group of players can both play seriously and achieve great heights while also being able to play games and have fun.

As the group grows, several more things will be added. Such as events, tournaments, and all kinds of other things.

There is currently also a small discord server.

Message me up In league and I will get you hooked up.
